air.name: air
air.description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as cloud giants, will-o'-wisps, and green and silver dragons.

aquatic.name: aquatic
aquatic.description: Creatures that live in watery environments, such as aboleths, crocodiles, lizardfolk, merfolk, octopi, and whales.

chaotic.name: chaotic
chaotic.description: Chaotic outsiders, such as chaos beasts, demons, djinni, and slaadi.

cold.name: cold
cold.description: Cold creatures, such as frost giants, ice mephits, and white dragons. Cold creatures are also immune to cold attacks but vulnerable to fire.

earth.name: earth
earth.description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as gargoyles, stone giants, and blue and copper dragons.

electricity.name: electricity
electricity.description: Creatures such as behirs and storm giants.

evil.name: evil
evil.description: Evil outsiders, such as demons, devils, night hags, and rakshasa.

fire.name: fire
fire.description: Fire creatures, such as fire elementals, fire giants, fire mephits, and red dragons. Fire creatures are also immune to fire attacks but vulnerable to cold.

good.name: good
good.description: Good outsiders, such as celestials, couatl, and titans.

incorporeal.name: incorporeal
incorporeal.description: Undead creatures with no physical form, able to pass through solid objects, and only able to be harmed by magic or other incorporeal creatures. Examples include shadows and spectres.

lawful.name: lawful
lawful.description: Lawful outsiders, such as archons, devils, formians, and rakshasa.

reptilian.name: reptilian
reptilian.description: Creatures such as basilisks, kobolds, lizardfolk, and trogolodytes.

water.name: water
water.description: Certain elementals and outsiders, as well as black and bronze dragons.
